snippet: The railroad operator said the bid undervalued the company and the chance for achieving regulatory approval was too low.
abstract: Norfolk Southern rejects Canadian Pacific's $28 billion takeover offer.
lead_paragraph: The railroad operator said the bid undervalued the company and the chance for achieving regulatory approval was too low.

headline.main: Norfolk Southern Rejects $28 Billion Bid From Canadian Pacific
headline.print_headline: Norfolk Southern Rejects Canadian Pacific’s Bid
